job_title: Senior Principal Engineer-Networking, Infra Automation, GTM/ LTM
job_description: Senior Principal Engineer, Service Delivery Dell Technologies customers rely on our products and services to drive progress. So, we take the service we provide extremely seriously. Service Delivery is all about making sure our technical solutions help clients fulfil their priorities, challenges and initiatives. As trusted advisors, we build in-depth knowledge of what each client wants to achieve. Then we make sure the services delivered by Dell Technologies deliver on all our promises. We also work closely with Sales and Global Services colleagues to develop strategic account growth plans, and to identify and pursue sales opportunities. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Senior Principal Engineer on our Managed Services Team in Bangalore. What you’ll achieve As a Senior Service Delivery Engineer, you will provide world-class delivery support to our customers by building an in-depth knowledge of our customers’ priorities and initiatives and becoming a trusted advisor that avoids customer impact and facilitates continuous improvement. You will identify potential sales and growth opportunities and will partner with key stakeholders to maximize these prospects. You will: As a SME will be front ending build, implementation, and operations of end-to-end network infrastructure across multiple data center environments. Supported network infrastructure for all customer-facing product offerings for external customers. Perform daily system monitoring, verifying the integrity and availability of all hardware, resources, systems and key processes, reviewing system and application logs, and verifying completion of scheduled jobs Strong knowledge on Networking and Switching Configuring and deleting access rules in Firewall and troubleshooting the issues. F5, Palo Alto, Sonic firewall - Configuring and troubleshooting virtual servers, pools, health monitors, SSL profiles, irules, generating CSRs, installing and renewing SSL certs, DNS virtual server for DNS load balancing, radius authentication. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements 12 to 15 years of relevant experience, 8-10 years strong experience on Dell Switches and F5 Load Balancing with strong hold on GTM & LTM Expert knowledge on VMware NSX Experience with the Networking technologies like routing, switching, security, load balancer, proxy, SDN, cloud etc Strong experience with VMware ESXi, ESX 5.x, vCenter 5.x is strongly desired. This experience should include the planning, deployment, configuration and administration of host systems and virtual machines. Knowledge of vCloud Director, SRM is desirable Automation skills – experience with Power shell scripting, Ansible , Python preferred Desirable Requirements VMware Certified Professional (VCP) preferred NSX T certified F5/Palo Alto certification Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
